org.apache.edgent.samples.connectors.elm327

Class Elm327Streams

extends java.lang.Object
    Streams fetching OBD-II data from an ELM327 through a serial device.

    • Method Detail

      • poll

        public static TStream<com.google.gson.JsonArray> poll(SerialDevice device,
                                                      long period,
                                                      java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit,
                                                      Cmd... cmds)
        Periodically execute a number of ELM327 commands. Each tuple on the returned stream is a JSON array containing the result for each command.
        Each result is a JSON object containing the command identifier with key pid and any result set by the individual command, typically with the key value.
        Parameters:
        device - Serial device the ELM327 is connected to.
        period - Period to poll.
        unit - Unit of period.
        cmds - Commands to execute.
        Returns:
        Stream containing the results of the command exections.
